title: Shop Kate Bosworth's Blue Crush-Inspired Roxy Swimwear - POPSUGAR
summary: Actress Kate Bosworth has partnered with Roxy to create a sustainable swimwear line inspired by her 2002 surfer hit "Blue Crush." The collection features bright bikinis, cropped rash guards, and reversible one-pieces in a wide range of styles.  The line is made up of environmentally-friendly fabrics like recycled nylon and organic cotton, placing an emphasis on eco-conscious materials and practices.
